1.title: Battle for Mewni: Return to Mewni/Battle for Mewni: Moon the Undaunted

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: When Star returns to her home dimension, she discovers that magic is disappearing throughout the kingdom. Star must dig deep and challenge her arch nemesis Ludo in an effort to save her family and kingdom.

2.title: Battle for Mewni: Book Be Gone/Battle for Mewni: Marco and the King

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Despite dire warnings, Ludo tries to write a new chapter in the Book of Spells. King River cannot keep up the kingdom without Queen Moon.

3.title: Battle for Mewni: Puddle Defender/Battle for Mewni: King Ludo

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Buffrog helps Star escape from Moon's ever-protective watch. With Ludo in control of the kingdom, Marco must decide his next move.

4.title: Battle for Mewni: Toffee

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: King Ludo's reign reaches as a tipping point as Star returns to the castle. Star must summon her strength to save her family and the kingdom.

5.title: Scent of a Hoodie/Rest in Pudding

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Star secretly keeps Marco's hoodie as a reminder of their friendship and is not ready to let him go. Star has recurring visions of Glossaryck and believes he's haunting her.

6.title: Club Snubbed/Stranger Danger

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Tom snubs Star at the Silver Bell Ball. Star meets the ancient Queen Eclipsa.

7.title: Demoncism/Sophomore Slump

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Star and Tom's relationship is put to the test when Tom decides to get rid of his demons! Marco decides to put in a full effort to living life in the present on Earth.

8.title: Lint Catcher/Trial by Squire

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Sir Lavabo, knight of the wash, gets a new squire. Star prepares for Quest Buy's Midnight Warrior Blowout Sale.

9.title: Princess Turdina/Starfari

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: A surprise visitor forces Marco to reveal Turdina's true identity. Star tries to understand why Mewmen treat monsters unfairly.

10.title: Sweet Dreams/Lava Lake Beach

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Star discovers she travels through multiple dimensions in her dreams. Kelly breaks up with her boyfriend and Marco questions his friendship with Star.

11.title: Death Peck/Ponymonium

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Star urges the royal youth of Mewni to sign a petition calling for the equal treatment of Monsters. Star is thrilled when Ponyhead invites her to dinner with her sisters.

12.title: Night Life/Deep Dive

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Star learns that Marco and Hekapoo have been dealing with rogue interdimensional portals. When Star's sleep-portaling becomes dangerous, she decides to end it.

13.title: Monster Bash

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Star throws a party at the ancient Monster Temple to celebrate Monsters and Mewmans living together in harmony.

14.title: Stump Day/Holiday Spellcial

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Marco tries to throw Star a surprise party; Eclipsa's dark spells are invited to an office holiday party.

15.title: The Bogbeast of Boggabah/Total Eclipsa the Moon

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: The Bogbeast of Boggabah: King River takes Star on a hunting trip to find the mystical Bogbeast of Boggadah. Total Eclipsa the Moon: Queen Moon enlists Eclipsa to help her access Mewni's most guarded records.

16.title: Butterfly Trap/Ludo, Where Art Thou?

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Moon and the Magic High Commission put Eclipsa on trial for her evil past. Dennis goes on a journey to find Ludo living in another dimension.

17.title: Is Another Mystery/Marco Jr.

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: When Buff Frog goes missing, Star goes in search for him. Marco returns to Echo Creek to learn that his mom is pregnant.

18.title: Skooled!/Booth Buddies

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: PonyHead goes back to St. O's and finds that the curriculum is tougher. Star and Marco get trapped together inside of a malfunctioning magical photo booth.

19.title: Bam Ui Pati!/Tough Love

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Ponyhead avoids her friends and family to watch the finale of her favorite Korean drama. Eclipsa and Moon work together to try and bring Meteora home peacefully.

20.title: Divide

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: As acting queen, Star sends Marco and his warriors to stall Meteora while she goes on a mission to find Moon.

21.title: Conquer

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Star needs to find a way to face off against Meteora alone, and in the process she must make a decision that will change Mewni forever.

1.title: Star Comes to Earth/Party with a Pony

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: An interstellar princess is exiled to earth and teams up with a teenage boy to battle villains from her universe.

2.title: Monster Arm/The Other Exchange Student

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Monster Arm: Star accidentally turns Marco's arm into a monster arm when he has to do karate. The Other Exchange Student: Star is jealous when the family's best friend shows up.

3.title: Match Maker/School Spirit

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: After failing a math test, Star tries to convince her teacher to change her grade. Star misunderstands when she hears that the school football team is going to "get slaughtered".

4.title: Cheer Up Star/Quest Buy

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Marco tries to cheer up Star and ends up summoning Ludo and an army of monsters! Star and Marco venture to Quest Buy to get a new wand charger before Star's wand dies...forever.

5.title: Diaz Family Vacation/Brittney's Party

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Star forgets to get the Diazes an anniversary present, so she invites them on a trip to Mewni. Star crashes a birthday party but has to fight off Ludo's monsters.

6.title: Mewberty/Pixtopia

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Star starts sprouting hearts all over her body, the telltale sign of "Mewberty." Marco and his friends travel to a dimension of pixies and are forced to work in the Shard Mines.

7.title: Lobster Claws/Sleep Spells

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Star and Marco attempt to help Lobster Claws adjust to life on Earth. When Star "sleep spells," Marco tries to use psychology to cure her.

8.title: Blood Moon Ball/Fortune Cookies

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: When Star attends Demon Prom with her ex-boyfriend, Marco follows to prevent Star from getting into trouble. Marco convinces Star that fortune cookies contain magical prophecies.

9.title: Freeze Day/Royal Pain

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Star must travel to the Plains of Time to convince Father Time to get back on his time wheel. Star's dad unexpectedly shows up at the Diaz house looking for a place to crash.

10.title: St. Olga's Reform School for Wayward Princesses

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Star must face her greatest fear and travel to St. Olga's Reform School for Wayward Princesses to bust out Flying Princess Pony Head for her birthday.

11.title: Mewnipendence Day/The Banagic Incident

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Star leads a battle reenactment as part of a Mewni Independence Day celebration. Star sees a commercial for a "magical" Earth product and sets off on her own to buy it.

12.title: Interdimensional Field Trip/Marco Grows A Beard

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Star leads a class field trip to a museum in another dimension. Star uses magic to help Marco grow a beard, but messes up the spell and causes it to grow out of control.

13.title: Storm the Castle

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: When Marco gets kidnapped by Toffee and held as wand-ransom, Star enters into an unlikely alliance with Ludo: she'll help Ludo get his castle back, if he helps her save Marco.

1.title: My New Wand!/Ludo in the Wild

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: When Star Butterfly destroys her wand to save her best friend Marco Diaz, a new unicorn takes place of the dead one. Now Star only has half of the star on her wand and it has been cleaved. She needs all the pieces of the wand but the other half was lost in the explosion. Join Star and Marco in their new adventure ahead!

2.title: Mr. Candle Cares/Red Belt

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Star rebels after the school guidance counselor insists her future is set in stone. Marco wants to get his life on track by finally earning his red belt in Karate.

3.title: Star on Wheels/Fetch

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Star on wheels: Marco teaches star how to ride a bike and she don't know how to stop. Fetch: star throws her wand,a dog won't give her wand back.

4.title: Star vs. Echo Creek/Wand to Wand

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Star goes on the run after accidentally crushing a police car. Star and Ludo struggle to get their new wands to work properly.

5.title: Starstruck/Camping Trip

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Star's biggest hero loses her mojo; King butterfly makes a surprise visit to Star during the Diaz family camping trip.

6.title: Starsitting/On the Job

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Star and Marco discover they have conflicting babysitting styles; Buffrog has to complete an important mission.

7.title: Goblin Dogs/By the Book

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Star and her friends want to get the best hot dogs in the Universe. Star and Marco want to convince Glossaryk to come out of a donut box.

8.title: Game of Flags/Girls' Day Out

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Star and Marco attend the annual Butterfly-Johansen family reunion. Star gets nominated for Mayor of Detention.

9.title: Sleepover/Gift of the Card

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: It's Star's slumber party and Ponyhead suggests they play a game she brought from Mewni. Marco has to use a gift card that Star gave to him before it expires.

10.title: Friendenemies/Is Mystery

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Tom returns, but instead of vying for Star's company - he vies for Marco's! Buff Frog investigates what made the hole in the Mewman force field.

11.title: Hungry Larry/Spider with a Top Hat

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Star and Marco want to help Mr. Diaz have the scariest Haunted House on the block. Star's most entertaining spell wants to be a fighting spell instead.

12.title: Into the Wand/Pizza Thing

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Star wants to fix whatever is wrong with her wand. Marco and Ponyhead go out for pizza.

13.title: Page Turner/Naysaya

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Star tries to resist the temptation of reading a forbidden chapter in her Book of Spells. Marco grows a second head that blurts out his darkest secrets and insecurities.

14.title: Bon Bon the Birthday Clown

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Star has second thoughts about attending a dead clown séance instead of a school dance with Marco.

15.title: Raid the Cave/Trickstar

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Star wants to rescue Glossaryck and the Book of Spells from Ludo. Star sets out to prove that a party magician is a real magician.

16.title: Baby/Running with Scissors

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Star needs to be prepared for an evaluation that will determine whether she can stay on Earth. Marco misuses Star's dimensional scissors and gets himself into some trouble.

17.title: Mathmagic/The Bounce Lounge

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Strange things happens when Star refuses to solve a math problem/Star and her friends try to open The Bounce Lounge again.

18.title: Crystal Clear/The Hard Way

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Star comes to an understanding with an intemperate member of the Magic High Council. Ludo begins learning spells.

19.title: Heinous/All Belts Are Off

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Mrs. Heinous has return and now seeks revenge on Marco / Marco tries to prove himself to Sensei that he is a better person than Jeremy on Karate.

20.title: Collateral Damage/Just Friends

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Star must find her way to relive her schoolmates spirit after she accidentally broke the school mascot's statue. Star, Marco, and Jackie attend a "Love Sentence" concert.

21.title: Face the Music

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: On Star's Song Day, Star and Marco work with songstrel Ruberiot to create a new song for the event.

22.title: Starcrushed

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: To take her mind off her strained relationship with Marco, Star ditches the Diaz's summer break party and joins her friends in a much more dangerous event.

1.title: Butterfly Follies

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Followed by the conclusion from before, many more affairs ensue within the land of Mewni and in the world of those influenced.

episode of.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil (TV Series 2015– )

imdb.plot outline: An interdimensional princess, from the kingdom of Mewni, named Star Butterfly is sent to a new dimension, the Earth dimension, to learn how to use her newest possession, the royal family wand, and she finds help along the way meeting an Earth boy named Marco Diaz, and she lives with Marco and his parents causing all kinds of interdimensional mischief.
imdb.title: Star vs. the Forces of Evil

other companies.name: International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees (IATSE)

plot: Intergalactic warrior Star Butterfly arrives on Earth to live with the Diaz family. She continues to battle villains throughout the universe and high school, mainly to protect her extremely powerful wand, an object that still confuses her.::Anonymous

An interdimensional princess, from the kingdom of Mewni, named Star Butterfly is sent to a new dimension, the Earth dimension, to learn how to use her newest possession, the royal family wand, and she finds help along the way meeting an Earth boy named Marco Diaz, and she lives with Marco and his parents causing all kinds of interdimensional mischief.::John Feneck

Star Butterfly (Eden Sher) is a kid who went from Mewni to Earth and then she got her first friend on Earth, Marco Diaz (Adam McArthur) and moves in with them, but still needs to fight Forces of Evil with Marco to protect her very powerful wand.

Star Butterfly is a queen in training from Mewni, another dimension. After her disruptive and destructive behavior, she is sent to Earth and meets Marco, a kid who likes karate and nachos. She uses her magical wand to deafeat Ludo and other villains. She goes on many different journeys to figure out what her destiny is.
